item.title: Inter Ikea 任命扬科夫斯基接替 Abrahamsson Ring 担任首席执行官
item.description: 瑞典家具品牌宜家（IKEA）的全球特许经营商英特宜家集团（Inter Ikea Group）表示，雅各布-扬科夫斯基（Jakub Jankowski）将于 1 月 1 日接任首席执行官一职，结束公司老将乔恩-亚伯拉罕松-林（Jon Abrahamsson Ring）长达五年的统治。【原文：Inter Ikea Group, the global franchiser of the Swedish furniture brand IKEA, said Jakub Jankowski will take over as chief executive officer on Jan. 1, ending the five-year reign of company veteran Jon Abrahamsson Ring.】

item.title: 收购 DoorDash 后，Deliveroo 首席执行官 Will Shu 将卸任
item.description: Deliveroo Plc 表示，首席执行官 Will Shu 将在 DoorDash 公司完成收购后从他创办的公司离职。该交易预计将于 10 月 2 日完成。【原文：Deliveroo Plc said Chief Executive Officer Will Shu will step down from the company he founded after DoorDash Inc. completes its acquisition. The deal is expected to close on October 2.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称通胀目标超调风险不大
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，即使最新预测继续显示物价涨幅将在一段时间内低于 2%，但通胀目标未达标的风险并不高。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said the risk of undershooting the inflation goal isn’t elevated, even if the latest projections continue to show a period of price gains falling below 2%.】

item.title: 台湾在新武器交易中重点关注 Anduril 无人机和软件
item.description: 台湾将从六家美国和加拿大公司开发或购买武器，这些公司加深了台湾在自主系统方面的投资，其中包括 Anduril Industries 公司的 DIVE-LD 水下无人机。【原文：Taiwan will develop or buy weapons from six US and Canadian companies that deepen its investment in autonomous systems, including Anduril Industries Inc.’s DIVE-LD underwater drone.】

item.title: 德国央行称德国本季度可能恢复增长
item.description: 据德国联邦银行（Bundesbank）称，在工业需求的推动下，德国经济可能在第三季度恢复增长。【原文：The German economy probably returned to growth in the third quarter, bolstered by industrial demand, according to the Bundesbank.】

item.title: 德意志银行首席财务官称，规则趋弱使美国银行更具优势
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）警告说，美国金融监管的全面倒退将给这家德国贷款机构的海外竞争对手带来优势。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG warned that a broad rollback of financial regulations in the US will give the German lender’s overseas competitor an edge.】

item.title: 老道氏理论从联邦快递财报中发现股市反弹线索
item.description: 联邦快递公司（FedEx Corp. ）周四公布的财报可能会提供一些线索，说明股市在创下最新纪录后还能涨多少，至少根据被称为 "道氏理论"（Dow Theory）的股市理论是这样。【原文：FedEx Corp.’s earnings on Thursday are likely to provide some clues about how much further the stock market rally can go after its latest record run, at least according to the stock market thesis called the Dow Theory.】

item.title: Pets at Home 发布最新盈利警告，首席执行官离职，业绩下滑
item.description: Pets at Home Group Plc 在不到两个月的时间内第二次下调利润预期，并称其首席执行官已经离职，其股价跌幅创下历史之最。【原文：Pets at Home Group Plc’s shares tumbled the most on record after it lowered its profit forecast for the second time in less than two months and said its chief executive officer has left the company.】

item.title: 关税恐慌之后，瑞士八月对美黄金出口大幅下滑
item.description: 欧洲主要精炼中心瑞士对美国的金条出口在 8 月份急剧下降，因为一项令人震惊的裁决暂时对金条征收关税。【原文：Bullion exports to the US from Europe’s main refining hub in Switzerland plummeted in August, after a shock ruling that temporarily imposed tariffs on gold bars.】

item.title: 苹果提价让 iPhone 质疑者有理由保持乐观
item.description: 苹果公司的最新款 iPhone 手机并没有令人眼花缭乱的新功能，但投资者开始看淡这一点，他们认为设备的价格上涨是买入该公司股票的理由。【原文：Apple Inc.’s latest iPhones didn’t dazzle with new features, but investors are starting to look past that, seeing higher price tags on the devices as a reason to buy the company’s shares.】

item.title: 凯捷出售约 32.5 亿欧元债券为 WNS 筹资
item.description: 凯捷公司（Capgemini SE）本周四将在欧洲一级市场上大展拳脚，预计将发售32.5亿欧元（38亿美元）的四期债券，为收购WNS Holdings Ltd.提供资金。【原文：Capgemini SE is making the biggest splash in Europe’s primary market on Thursday, selling an expected €3.25 billion ($3.8 billion) four-part bond offering to help finance its acquisition of WNS Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 现代汽车下调盈利预期，原因是为规避关税而增加开支
item.description: 现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor Co.）上调了 2025 年的收入预期，同时降低了利润预期，因为这家韩国汽车制造商加快了在美国的投资，以减轻关税成本。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. raised its revenue forecast for 2025 while paring profit expectations as the South Korean automaker accelerates investment in the US to mitigate tariff costs.】

item.title: 北约基金选择西班牙初创公司进行首次卫星投资
item.description: 北约投资基金（NIF）选择了一家西班牙初创公司作为其在卫星技术领域的首笔投资，这是欧洲推动在欧洲大陆发展卫星技术产业的新举措。【原文：NATO’s investment fund NIF picked a Spanish startup for its first investment in satellite technology, a new step in Europe’s push to develop that industry in the continent.】

item.title: 国债重拾涨势，押注更多降息即将到来
item.description: 在美联储周三降息巩固了更多宽松货币政策的赌注之后，国债创下了一周多以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Treasuries headed for their biggest advance in more than a week after the Federal Reserve’s interest rate cut on Wednesday cemented bets of more monetary easing.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构向拉筹伯信贷基金发出停止令
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构暂时禁止拉筹伯金融资产管理有限公司（La Trobe Financial Asset Management Ltd.）销售其美国私人信贷基金，理由是担心该产品可能不 "适合 "消费者。【原文：Australia’s corporate watchdog has temporarily banned La Trobe Financial Asset Management Ltd. from marketing its US private credit fund, citing concerns that the product may not be “suitable” for consumers.】

item.title: 挪威银行降低利率，但对未来行动发出谨慎信号
item.description: 挪威央行今年第二次下调借贷成本，但表示在通胀顽固的情况下，进一步下调借贷成本的速度可能会放缓。【原文：Norway’s central bank delivered its second reduction in borrowing costs this year but signaled that it may be slow to cut them further amid stubborn inflation.】

item.title: 沙特房地产热潮中的红海住宅售价高达 4000 万美元
item.description: 在沙特阿拉伯海岸附近的红海群岛上，豪华别墅和公寓如雨后春笋般拔地而起，成为沙特王国房地产市场繁荣的最新标志。【原文：Luxury villas and apartments are sprouting up on an archipelago in the Red Sea just off Saudi Arabia’s shores, becoming the latest symbol of the boom in the kingdom’s property market.】

item.title: 章鱼能源公司称计划分拆技术部门 Kraken
item.description: 英国最大的电力供应商 Octopus Energy Group Ltd. 表示将分拆 Kraken Technologies Ltd. 以加快业务扩张。【原文：The UK’s largest electricity supplier, Octopus Energy Group Ltd. said it’s spinning off Kraken Technologies Ltd. to speed the expansion of the business.】

item.title: 德国为国防和基础设施建设提高债务销售额
item.description: 德国第四季度的借贷将比计划多出约五分之一，以帮助为基础设施和武装部队的支出激增提供资金。【原文：Germany will borrow about a fifth more than planned in the fourth quarter to help fund a surge in spending on infrastructure and the armed forces.】

item.title: 奇货可居：特拉华州公司主导地位面临的威胁（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：特拉华州公司主导地位面临的威胁（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: The Threat to Delaware’s Corporate Dominance (Podcast)】

item.title: 德意志银行债券交易收入高于预期
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）首席财务官詹姆斯-冯-莫尔特克（James von Moltke）表示，德意志银行第三季度固定收益和货币交易收入有望高于分析师目前的预期。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is on track to report higher revenue from trading fixed income and currencies in the third quarter than analysts currently expect, according to Chief Financial Officer James von Moltke.】

item.title: 劳埃德银行计划与商业地产贷款相关的 SRT 交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，劳埃德银行集团（Lloyds Banking Group Plc）正在出售一项与约 5 亿英镑（6.81 亿美元）商业房地产贷款相关的重大风险转移。【原文：Lloyds Banking Group Plc is selling a significant risk transfer linked to around £500 million ($681 million) of commercial real estate loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Infini 成为一系列中国股票配售的唯一买家
item.description: 在股市飙升的背景下，一家总部位于香港的投资公司通过高调配股抢购中国股票，迅速获得收益。【原文：A Hong Kong-based investment firm is reaping rapid gains by snapping up Chinese equities through high-profile share placements amid a surging stock market.】

item.title: 并非所有评级都受欢迎：穆迪仍将软银列为 "垃圾 "评级
item.description: 评级上调通常是一件值得庆祝的事。那么，当穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）上调日本软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp.【原文：A rating upgrade is usually a cause for celebration. So why when Moody’s Ratings bumped up its rating for Japan’s SoftBank Group Corp. did the company bristle?】

item.title: 大陆公司分拆后，Aumovio 开始在法兰克福交易
item.description: 汽车供应商 Aumovio 的股票在从大陆股份公司拆分后开始在法兰克福证券交易所交易，这家德国制造商重新专注于其轮胎部门。【原文：Shares of auto supplier Aumovio started trading on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange following a split from Continental AG, as the German manufacturer refocuses on its tires division.】

item.title: 三星、SK、现代计划掀起招聘热潮，促进韩国青年就业
item.description: 三星集团、SK 集团和现代汽车集团宣布计划在今年招聘数千名工人，这表明韩国顶级企业集团正在响应李在明总统的号召，解决韩国青年就业率下降的问题。【原文：Samsung Group, SK Group and Hyundai Motor Group announced plans to hire thousands of workers this year, signaling South Korea’s top conglomerates are responding to President Lee Jae Myung’s call to tackle the nation’s declining youth employment.】

item.title: 印尼将 2026 年赤字目标提高至 2.68% 靠的是地区资金
item.description: 印度尼西亚提高了 2026 年的预算赤字目标，原因是计划增加政府支出，包括在东南亚国家发生暴力抗议活动几周后增加对各地区的转移支付。【原文：Indonesia raised its budget deficit target for 2026 on plans for higher government spending, including increased transfers to regions weeks after violent protests rocked the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行模型显示中性利率预估大幅下调
item.description: 根据《信息自由法》（Freedom Information Act）的要求，一份内部文件于周四公布，其中显示澳大利亚储备银行的中性现金利率模型意味着其估计值将 "大幅下调"，而就业市场被认为比之前想象的更为紧张。【原文：The Reserve Bank of Australia’s model of the neutral cash rate implies a “significant downward revision” to its estimates while the job market is seen as tighter than previously thought, according to internal documents released Thursday under a Freedom of Information Act request.】

item.title: 瑞士钟表出口因中国需求疲软和美国关税而大幅下滑
item.description: 由于中国需求持续疲软，加上美国开始征收严厉的关税，8 月份瑞士钟表出口大幅下滑。【原文：Swiss watch exports tumbled in August as Chinese demand remained weak and stiff US tariffs went into effect.】
